chunk_id: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0__chunk_672
source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
CAESAREAN DELIVERY/SECTION (VBAC) 
â€¢ Management is similar to normal labour with the following precautions:
o exclude all the contraindications for VBAC listed above
o conduct labour in a hospital that can perform CD on a 24-hour basis
o run an intravenous drip with one litre Sodium Chloride 0,9% at 80-120 mL/hour and pass a urinary
catheter to monitor urinary excretion
o monitor with continuous CTG
o always use a partogram (do two hourly vaginal examinations once in active labour) and intervene
